ingredients: 1/2 cup vegetable or olive oil, plus a little more for the onion
fresh hot green chiles to taste (2 serranos or 1 large jalapeño), stemmed and quartered
4 medium sized chicken breast halves, boneless and skinless
1 medium white onion, cut into 1/2-inch slices
2 romaine hearts, sliced crosswise at 1/2-inch thick
1/3 cup grated Mexican queso añejo or other garnishing cheese like Romano or Parmesan
